subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Steve Addington will call Sunday’s race at Talladega and then hand the job to Dave Rogers in a firing that admittedly left Addington “pretty confused.”
snippet: Steve Addington will call Sunday’s race at Talladega and then hand the job to Dave Rogers in a firing that admittedly left Addington “pretty confused.”
